sentence: The races are being closely watched to see if more far-right candidates across the country can follow in the footsteps of Doug Mastriano, who won Pennsylvania's Republican primary race for governor last week by running a campaign focused on pushing Trump's election falsehoods.
author: Daniel Bush
title: Georgia Primaries Will Test Trump's Revenge Campaign Against GOP Incumbents

sentence: Most recently, this trend was on display in DOUG MASTRIANOs victory in the Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial primary (though he rejects the label).
title: POLITICO Playbook: Trumps new obsession
